name: Sour Cream Banana Cake
author: Margaret Wehling
summary: This cake recipe came from Denmark with my Great Grandmother and Great Grandfather when they came over to the United States.
directions: Cream brown sugar and 1 cup butter, add eggs 1 at a time; beat well
Add mashed bananas and flour and salt, baking soda along with 1 cup sour cream
Pour batter into 3 - 9 inch pans or a 13 x 9 inch pan
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven until cake tests done with a tooth pick, about 30 to 40 minutes for the 9 inch round cakes or about 40 to 50 minutes for the 13 x 9 inch cake
To make Frosting:  Mix 1/2 cup of butter or margarine, 4 cups of confectioners' sugar and 1/4 cup sour cream (more if needed)
Add 1 teaspoon vanilla and  beat until fluffy
yield: 3 - 9 inch layers or 9 x 13 inch pan
